description:
• Are you a single woman that is struggling to attract the right man into your life?
  • Do you feel like you have lots to offer but keep having unsuccessful relationship with the wrong guy?
  • Do you struggle to get a guy to commit?
  • Are you sick and tired of feeling lonely and unsuccessful in love?

If you say YES to any of the above, we invite you to explore & get involved in our REAL, RAW, AUTHENTIC conversations in this course - which teaches the modern women how to attract the MAN that they truly deserve.

What we commonly see is the pool of beautiful, amazing and successful women struggling to attract a man that can love, accept and support them to be all that they can be, to have the love and passion they truly deserve.

Hi my name is Jane Nguyen, Author, Speaker & Dating Coach & Relationship Mentor from Honeymoon Forever.

Hi my name is Melina Macdonald, Intimate Product & Lifestyle Educator from Taboo Intimacy & Love Indulgence.

With us is our guest speaker - Patty-Ann Waho, Sexuality & Sensuality Expert from Inner Sparks System

We are here today to share with you our amazing program called "The Ultimate Dating Guide For The Modern Women"

Our program "The Ultimate Dating Guide For The Modern Women" is designed to give you lots of great insights into successful dating.

Some of the hot topics that we cover include:

  • The types of guys to date & those to avoid
  • Why do you attract bad boys and unsuccessful relationship?
  • Attraction strategies for instant and deep connection
  • How to let go of your ex and past emotional baggage
  • Dressing tips for dating success

And much more…

What also makes the program unique and different is that these are simple, easy to apply strategies that WORK!!!

We have combined our experience & expertise to share with you the best that we have learned over the years to figure our the codes to successful dating.

We have done the leg work for you…sharing with you only those we have tested & applied in our lives and from our clients that we have worked with.

This program allows you to do it in the comfort of your own home, when it fits you & your schedule.

Partnered with 100% Money Back Guarantee, join Melina, Jane and Patty in learning how to attract the right guy in less than 21 days!
title: Single ladies - How to attract the man you truly desire
